changelog.change: Place chats top to bottom and scroll baby scroll
Static message within chat display as well as translated within the mchat_lang.php file for proper translation (read the comments in the lang file to see how to do this)
Allow users to not display the chat on index.php and allow them to disable sound notifications
Default and Custom BBcodes displayed (if set to be shown on posting page) and removed if set in ACP entries
Allow minimum post characters and max smilies forum post settings to be overridden
Set the amount of time to deactivate autoupdate on users that just leave the chat open (optional)
Pause refresh on input of message (so focus is not removed from input area)
"Reset" input message area button (only active when in the input area of the chat)
Autogrow input area (max 750 pixels in width...changeable within the mchat_ajax_mini.js file..search for "750" and change the number if you desire)
Setting in ACP to allow messages to display new posts on the forum (you must have the "notification of new topics" add-on installed)
Add mchat_sessions table within the database
